C

centreWindow(Window) - Static method in class aston.group20.GUIview.GUI
This method centres the GUI window and works on all screen sizes.
chosenStrategy - Variable in class aston.group20.model.Simulator
 
clear() - Method in class aston.group20.model.AirControlTower
This method is used to clear the queues and the counter; it is called from the Simulator class when we want to reset the Simulation.
clear() - Method in class aston.group20.model.Counter
This method clears all of the fields, so that they are ready to be used for a new Simulation.
clearRunway - Variable in class aston.group20.model.Runway
 
commercial - Variable in class aston.group20.test.TestAircraft
 
COMMERCIAL_CREATION_PROBABILITY - Variable in class aston.group20.model.Hangar
 
COMMERCIAL_FUEL_FLYING_TIME - Static variable in class aston.group20.model.CommercialAircraft
 
COMMERCIAL_LANDING - Static variable in class aston.group20.model.CommercialAircraft
 
COMMERCIAL_TAKEOFF - Static variable in class aston.group20.model.CommercialAircraft
 
CommercialAircraft - Class in aston.group20.model
This concrete subclass defines the characteristics of CommercialAircraft; it defines the landing time, the takeoff time and the length of time it can fly for (it's fuel level) in order to successfully inherit from the PoweredAircraft class.
CommercialAircraft() - Constructor for class aston.group20.model.CommercialAircraft
Creating a new CommercialAircraft, calling the constructor of the PoweredAircraft class and filling in the values required to instantiate the object.
commercialSlider - Variable in class aston.group20.GUIview.GUI
 
compare(Object, Object) - Method in class aston.group20.model.FuelStrategy
This method is used in order to fulfil the Inheritance of the Strategy superclass.
compare(Object, Object) - Method in class aston.group20.model.Strategy
This method is used to sort the Incoming Aircraft queue in the AirControlTower class based on a specified integer value, defined by the concrete subclasses, which will likely make use of the Integer.compare method in order to shorten the process of comparing the two Aircraft objects.
compare(Object, Object) - Method in class aston.group20.model.WaitingTimeStrategy
This method is used in order to fulfil the Inheritance of the Strategy superclass.
compareTo(IAircraft) - Method in class aston.group20.model.Aircraft
This method compares this Aircraft with the parameter Aircraft by identifier; it can give information as to whether the parameter Aircraft is the same Aircraft as this Aircraft, was created before this Aircraft, or was created after this Aircraft.
counter - Variable in class aston.group20.model.AirControlTower
 
Counter - Class in aston.group20.model
The Counter class is used to store and display information regarding the Simulation; it is used for both the basic console interface as well as the short and long GUI reports.
Counter() - Constructor for class aston.group20.model.Counter
Creates a new Counter, which will call the clear method to ensure that all of the fields are reset to zero, ready for the Simulation to begin.
crashed - Variable in class aston.group20.model.Aircraft
 
crashes - Variable in class aston.group20.model.Counter
